about_the_game:
This is a moving puzzle adventure story about a teenage girl, Mia, who witnessed the tragic fall of her homeland and the explosion of the Sun. A heavy burden fell on her fragile shoulders - she must restore light to the land and peace in her heart. Will she succeed?

About the demo

This is the demo of Echoes of the Sun game. It is a part of a first-person puzzle-platformer adventure game in a fantasy setting where you play as a brave girl with telekinesis, who tries to reach her parents.

Restore the environment

Extinguish fires, rebuild surroundings, and bring nature around you back to life.

Use Telekinesis

Manipulate objects, interact with mechanisms, and overcome obstacles.

Solve Solar Magic Puzzles

Use various magical devices to bend and combine energy beams, activating solar magic and gradually restoring the world.

Explore an Island Full of Ghosts and Mysteries

As you journey through Zoria, you'll encounter touching and chilling stories of ghosts filled with secrets and heartfelt confessions. Uncover the true story.

Restoring the world is no easy task, but those who are brave and pure of heart will surely succeed. Let’s embark on this challenging journey with Mia and make Zoria a brighter place!

  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • VR Support: OpenXR (Meta Quest / Valve Index)
